resources.string: Learn Photography through the seven Principles of Design
Select A Category to Start Your Learning Journey!
This is an example of a photograph from this principle!
Toggle the theme between light and dark

getImagesForCategory(categoryId: Int): Retrieves a list of images associated with the specified category from the local database. getImageById(id: Int): Retrieves an image with the specified ID from the local database. insertImage(image: Image): Inserts a new image into the local database. updateImage(image: Image): Updates an existing image in the local database. deleteImage(image: Image): Deletes an image from the local database.
Read to learn, shake to know more!
